thread.title: Dollar Weakens on Downbeat U.S. Sales Numbers
thread.title_full: Dollar Weakens on Downbeat U.S. Sales Numbers - WSJ

author: James Ramage
title: Dollar Weakens on Downbeat U.S. Sales Numbers
text:
The dollar fell against the euro and the yen after lukewarm numbers for U.S. retail sales in September signaled slowing momentum in the U.S. growth outlook.
Decelerating economic expansion will add more pressure on the Federal Reserve to delay a rate increase, a move investors expect will weigh on the U.S. currency.
The dollar slid... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
